title: Best of the best blueberry muffins
ingredients: ['110g unsalted butter', '250g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '250g plain flour, divided', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '125ml buttermilk', '1 punnet fresh blueberries - rinsed, drained and patted dry', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
